snippet: It's important that the public editor's job at The New York Times be a two-way street, or even one of those insane intersections where traffic is going every which way.
abstract: It's important that the public editor's job at The New York Times be a two-way street, or even one of those insane intersections where traffic is going every which way.

headline.main: Three Days in the Fishbowl, and Here to Tell the Tale
